concept.title: Marketing Cloud
concept.shortdesc: The Marketing Cloud is an integrated family of digital marketing solutions, as well as an intuitive interface for new resources and capabilities, called core services, for your business. Solutions include: Reports & Analytics, Ad Hoc Analysis, Data Workbench, Data Warehouse, Visitor Click Map, and Adobe Report Builder.

conbody.p: The Marketing Cloud Exchange is a single destination where you can search, browse, select, pay, and download digital marketing extensions via apps. Partners can submit their applications to the Exchange Marketplace with their description, images, videos and documentation.
